metadata.Title: CVE-2022-1238 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - medium.
metadata.Description: Out-of-bounds Write in libr/bin/format/ne/ne.c in GitHub repository radareorg/radare2 prior to 5.6.8. This vulnerability is heap overflow and may be exploitable. For more general description of heap buffer overflow, see [CWE](https://cwe.mitre.org/data/definitions/122.html).

criterions.comment: radare2 package in lunar is affected and may need fixing.
